attributes.additional_details:
I call for the abolishment of Ofsted because of their negative impact to education and the people that work in the education sector. Ofsted does more harm than good. 

Teachers deserve to be happy and stress free. The number of teachers and head teachers leaving the professions are worryingly high. Enough is enough, Ofsted needs to be abolished.
attributes.background: For years Ofsted inspections have affected the mental health of many educators. They cause stress, fear, anxiety and added pressure to schools and their staff. The negative process of inspections leave staff with huge stress and anxiety levels. Affecting their work and personal life.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/635116

We have also published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Urgently review the current Ofsted Framework and associated methodology: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/635055
